claim: An image showing Mathira Member of Parliament Rigathi Gachagua waving at Orange Democratic Movement (ODM) Party leader Raila Odinga’s convoy in Nyeri

claim: Photo shows a temple that has been converted into a mosque.
source: Indira Gandhi National Centre for the Arts (IGNCA)
motivation: not enough information

claim: A group photo of Mahatma Gandhi when he served as a Sergeant Major of the British army.

claim: Design picture of the road cum highway underwater tunnel to be built across the Brahmaputra river in Assam.

claim: Recent picture of Major Vibhuti Shankar’s wife and his family members mourning on his coffin.

claim: Photo of Delhi Jama Masjid’s dome which has been recently damaged in the storm.

claim: The kenya kwanza presidential running mate rigathi gachagua, in a family photo of the late president daniel moi.

claim: Photo of a Hindu family who converted to Islam in the United States.

claim: Photo of a burqa-clad Qatari news anchor expressing concern over religious freedom in India.

claim: Images showing three Muslims killed in Bengaluru police firing during protests against Nupur Sharma’s statements on Prophet Muhammad.
